dialogue_turns.speaker: Intro
dialogue_turns.text: At the Akorda press center, a new diplomatic announcement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At the Akorda press center, a new diplomatic announcement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Rumen Radev of Bulgaria is heading to Kazakhstan next week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Rumen Radev of Bulgaria is heading to Kazakhstan next week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Bulgaria Rumen Radev will pay an official visit to Kazakhstan, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, on June 8th and 9th, I think it said. Invited by President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, on June eighth and ninth, I think it said. Invited by President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "On June 8–9, at the invitation of Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, President of Bulgaria Rumen Radev will pay an official visit to Kazakhstan," the statement from Akorda reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, it's an official visit, so you know the agenda is gonna be packed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, it's an official visit, so you know the agenda is gonna be packed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "On June 8–9, at the invitation of Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, President of Bulgaria Rumen Radev will pay an official visit to Kazakhstan," the statement from Akorda reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And the main focus, um, seems to be on trade and economic cooperation between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And the main focus, um, seems to be on trade and economic cooperation between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During high-level talks, the parties will discuss prospects for the development of Kazakh-Bulgarian trade, economic, and investment cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and investment too. I mean, that's a huge area for potential growth, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and investment too. I mean, that's a huge area for potential growth, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During high-level talks, the parties will discuss prospects for the development of Kazakh-Bulgarian trade, economic, and investment cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Bulgaria's part of the EU, so that opens up a lot of doors for Kazakhstan in terms of market access.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Bulgaria's part of the E U, so that opens up a lot of doors for Kazakhstan in terms of market access.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, 'cause, like, we don't hear about a ton of diplomatic traffic between those two specifically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, 'cause, like, we don't hear about a ton of diplomatic traffic between those two specifically.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, which makes this visit even more significant. You gotta wonder what specific sectors they're targeting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, which makes this visit even more significant. You gotta wonder what specific sectors they're targeting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Energy comes to mind, maybe? Or infrastructure? Kazakhstan has massive resources.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Energy comes to mind, maybe? Or infrastructure? Kazakhstan has massive resources.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh definitely. And Bulgaria could be a lot looking for stable energy suppliers, given everything going on in Europe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh definitely. And Bulgaria could be a lot looking for stable energy suppliers, given everything going on in Europe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, uh, the whole investment angle—maybe Bulgarian companies are eyeing opportunities there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, uh, the whole investment angle-maybe Bulgarian companies are eyeing opportunities there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a two-way street, for sure. I'm curious to see what agreements come out of those high-level talks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a two-way street, for sure. I'm curious to see what agreements come out of those high-level talks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Same here. We should keep an eye on the news next week for any announcements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Same here. We should keep an eye on the news next week for any announcements.
